presence.playback.playing.description: Shows when you hover over the little play icon at your Discord Rich Presence

presence.playback.paused.description: Shows when you hover over the little paused icon at your Discord Rich Presence

presence.activity.browsing.description: Shows when you hover over the little magnifying glass icon at your Discord Rich Presence

presence.activity.live.description: Shows when you hover over the little red circle icon at your Discord Rich Presence

presence.activity.reading.description: Shows when you hover over the little icon at your Discord Rich Presence

presence.activity.searching.description: Shows when you hover over the little icon at your Discord Rich Presence

presence.media.info.episode.description: Shows the current episode at your Discord Rich Presence; {0} will be replaced -> is a variable and should not be translated
